root: ^Welcome! You can advance the dialogue with the "F" key
^This is going to be a playtest for the game Frog Knight!
^By continuing this playtest, you are consenting to your data being gathered
^Your identity will be anonymized and any data will not be connected with you
^1-4 keys can be used to select dialogue options
^Do you consent to your data being gathered?

main: ^This is a turn-based rpg  where enemies move after you
^When in dialogue, you cannot move. Outside of it, you can use WASD to move around
^To cast spells, use 1-4 on the keyboard and then click on the target
^Would you like me to repeat myself?

c-1: ^Beware the corrupted skeletons in this cave, defend yourself against them!
